tag_list: web-marketing, seo, adwords, analytics, google, business-development, new-zealand, auckland
overview:
Francois Bondiguel (born February 13, 1985 in Rennes, France) is an online marketer and co-founder of The Distiller, a cluster of technology entrepreneurs based in New Zealand.

He attended ESDES Business School in Lyon, France (Master of Entrepreneurship 2008) and the University of Otago in Dunedin, New Zealand (PGDip in Commerce, 2007) and began his career as an Operations Manager at web development firm eMedia Limited.

In 2008 he co-founded PocketSmith, a successful web based personal finance and budgeting SaaS with Jason Leong and James Wigglesworth.

He is currently a Digital Strategist for Smartebusiness, a UK agency who has successfully promoted products and services for B2B and B2C companies such as Siemens, Beaverbrooks, Love Hearts, Brook Taverner, Wolsey and Ubisoft.
